website_summaries.verdict: With its sleek brushed stainless steel design, this simple yet functional model is perfectly compatible with small square tissue boxes.
pros: A simple straightforward design with no fuss
We love that it's easy to clean and fingerprints don't show up like on some other stainless steel designs
Offers excellent value for the money
cons: Users report having received damaged covers — shipping packaging could be improved

customer_reviews.title: Small dents, crease down the back, so-so
customer_reviews.text: The finish is nice, I ordered the brushed stainless, the bottom edge is rolled so it won’t scratch the glass top table it’s on. There is an indentation from top to bottom on one side, there is a small dent on the top, and small marred area on one of the sides. Probably should have returned it, but for now it’s better than the Kleenex printed box. Couldn’t find a brushed stainless in the stores, so this will do for now. Reality is, it’s discount store quality at department store price. I was able to get the sticker off with minimal effort, using a goo gone sticker remover and the little plastic marvel of a tool that comes with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lan B

customer_reviews.title: Matches Decor but is Flawed
customer_reviews.text: Intended for guest bathroom, that gets little use. So... the defects found in the product are acceptable. Several bumps and indentations and small scratches that aren't highly visible. Highly noticeable seam where the metal was joined. Since the bad side can be placed against the wall -- and will be invisible -- the tissue box will not be returned for replacement. The brushed metal surface matches the finishes in the bathroom. I'd be happier if the surface was pristine.
customer_reviews.author: Roxies_Dad

customer_reviews.title: Sticker is very frustrating
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it’s good, but I really dislike when a company puts their sticker on a product, especially when it doesn’t peel off easily. Once it came off, I used WD40 and it wiped clean. But they should not include a sticker on the outside surface (maybe put it on the inside)
customer_reviews.author: Jason M. Pecora

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect, no protective packaging... otherwise nice.
customer_reviews.text: Works and attractive BUT... Metal is not consistent color - there is banding (darker color) on upper inch on one side The seam is also visible, yet smooth. Bottom a bit sharp - might scratch softer surfaces. THOUGHTLESS PACKAGING- shipped bare in a cardboard box - received with minor scratches from sliding around. C'mon, so easy to use bubble wrap or plastic to protect it!
customer_reviews.author: J. A.

customer_reviews.title: look
customer_reviews.text: Its a very nice design but they put a sticker on the side of it thats very hard to remove and looks awful when it is off. Need to eliminate sticker please.
customer_reviews.author: robert housman

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I like it, it's fit for purpose. Quite pretty in person. Doesn't seem to show dust or fingerprints. Good price. Bought it to replace one from pottery barn that was much more expensive which ended up pitting and rusting.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Valleau

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Came with a dent on the top. This is metal & it was in a very well packed box so it did not happen in transit. Edges are not finished properly and almost looks like scratches. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Teri L

customer_reviews.title: Good looking ~
customer_reviews.text: It is great looking and nicely made. It goes well with my other things in the bathroom. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Ok softness I gave a 5 as I didn't want it to get lower stars. It is metal so mo it is not soft. Looks nice. Delivered on time. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: sandi l

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This tissue box is absolutely beautiful. It matches chrome decor in a bathroom amazing and really brings a little extra to the room with the shine. It was a great value and I enjoyed it so much I purchased other matching items from the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: loveamazon

customer_reviews.title: I love this product! Adds a beautiful detail
customer_reviews.text: I love this tissue box cover. I had several square tissue boxes and fit perfectly over them. My lobby area is rose gold so this adds the perfect touch. A little more expensive than I would have like to paid but I understand the quality and convenient shipping
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sleek Tissue Box
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why the ratings ask for softness and stretch. This is a metal tissue box. No softness and stretch to this product. That being said I like this tissue cover. It fits over the box nicely and looks nice in my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy McCauley

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and matches my lamp well. I would buy it again. Not too heavy, but enough to have it stay put when pulling a tissue out. Nice not to have to try and find a box of tissues that will not clash with the colors in the room.
customer_reviews.author: Appalachian1

customer_reviews.title: Just OK for me
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit disappointed when the tissue box was received even though I was looking for a good deal and wasn’t expecting much. I guess I was hopeful :) For me these boxes tend to rust in my bathroom so we’ll see how long this one lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Stainless Tissue Holder
customer_reviews.text: I needed a compact but nice looking tissue box for the kitchen that would blend with the stainless steel. This is just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: C. Mcgregor

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive, simple design. Mine arrived with a few scratches so I did not give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Nicky Z

customer_reviews.title: Great for a cabin, not a home.
customer_reviews.text: Really poor quality. Metal is easily pliable and bends with little resistance. Also, in today's technology, who puts a sticker of the creating company on a brushed product that isn't aligned for easy removal? It took me 10 minutes to get the sticker off and another 5 minutes to remove the leftover glue on the product. Not a good product.
customer_reviews.author: cjjrod

customer_reviews.title: Classy kitchen addition!
customer_reviews.text: Redoing my kitchen over with light grey walls, white appliances and white tile floor with silver compliments, one of which is the silver tissue box. Love the looks!!
customer_reviews.author: Jerrilyn Roth

customer_reviews.title: Love all my stainless
customer_reviews.text: Works well on kitchen counter coordinating with the soap dispenser and kitchen garbage can I also bought here at Amazon for use with all the stainless steel appliances in my kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I just renovated my master bathroom with, among other features, gold hardware and wanted gold accessories. The tissue box case and toilet bowl brush I ordered fit it beautifully in every respect, quality and appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect match
customer_reviews.text: Looks fantastic in the bathroom. Matches the brushed nickel fixtures perfectly (see the picture with the mirror) but there are lines and marks on the metal on two sides. Good news is it can be hidden depending on how you position it.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Grant

customer_reviews.title: Lots of scratches!
customer_reviews.text: First one arrived scratched on 3 sides! I sent it back and the next one I received is scratched on one side. It is disappointing that their quality control does not catch these defects. I'm going to keep this one since I need a tissue box cover for my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Hamid

customer_reviews.title: Fine
customer_reviews.text: Had to exchange the initial one bc it arrived dented. Second was fine. Lightweight. Looks good when not dented
customer_reviews.author: brie

customer_reviews.title: Finish may have flaws.
customer_reviews.text: The finish color was as expected. Style is fi e. Ordered 3 - kept 2 - sent 1 back because there were visible scratches at one bottom corner and a small dent in an upper corner. Ordered another, no dents this time but still some scratches. Didn’t want to bother sending back so I’ve kept it. Wish all 3 originally ordered had been in good shape though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, not flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: Contemporary stylish sleek look. Adds a nice look to my bedside. Lightweight also an added plus to this tissue box cover.
customer_reviews.author: C. A.

customer_reviews.title: Poorly wrapped
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and they were delivered today. They are well made and pretty covers for a box of tissues, BUT they came scratched up because they were put in a box together with no bubble wrap included. Im RARELY disappointed with amazon deliveries, so I’ll just take this one on the chin.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Treacy

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating Sticker
customer_reviews.text: Pretty color but sticker is super frustrating... it’s not an “easy” sticker to get off and will be going on my desk so the tissue box is visible from all 4 sides so can’t just hide it... don’t want to use any adhesive remover since it might tarnish the color. Very frustrating for such a beautiful tissue box.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Parker

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality and better than the versions I looked at in retail stores. No fingerprints on these.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea P

customer_reviews.title: Tissue Box With Flaws
customer_reviews.text: They have slight metal flaws and scratches on the outside of the tissue box.
customer_reviews.author: Clint

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! Perfect for my bathroom! I’m very pleased with this buy!
customer_reviews.author: Sally Hester

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: It is for tissues, the 'softness' doesn't matter. It is very lightweight and sometimes rattles against the marble ocunter if you have to pull to get a tissue our.
customer_reviews.author: Mahtmuse

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and weighty
customer_reviews.text: As much as I love stainless steel I didn't even order this for the beauty. It is great to add weight to the kleenex box so that you can remove a tissue without the box going flying!
customer_reviews.author: James F. Rendek

customer_reviews.title: Great for bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Matches our fixtures. Had for a few months. No dents or scratches and cleans easily.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren EFJ

customer_reviews.title: Sleek & Attractive
customer_reviews.text: While a plain and simple design, this Tissue Box Holder is very attractive. It was a gift for my daughter's Powder Room and it complements the other stainless items in the room perfectly. We are both happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Coffee-lover

customer_reviews.title: Great Stainless steel match
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a tissue box for my kitchen counter. I wanted something that went will with my stainless applicances and hardware. It looks perfect and was delived intact. I was very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I wanted. Light weight, sturdy and sleek. I didn't want anything ornate and this was perfect. It's exactly what you see in the photo image of the product.
customer_reviews.author: mallory antos

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product... simple design and matches the other brushed nickel in my bathroom. There's no bottom fyi so convenient to slip over the box but know the cardboard will be on the surface of where ever you're putting it in case its wet.
customer_reviews.author: Teach 30

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: This box is perfect for putting the finishing touch on our remodeled laundry room. It is heavy enough to hold the box down, and matches the new washer and dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Stephany

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: Thought it was going to feel more durable, the look is nice but not the quality I expected to be.
customer_reviews.author: linra

customer_reviews.title: JUST WHAT I NEEDED
customer_reviews.text: I had to have a new tissue box because the one I had in the bathroom came unglued at the seams after 12 years. I like this one much better because there are not any seams. It should last forever. Very attractive and modern. Exactly what I needed,.
customer_reviews.author: Smitty

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really enjoyed this product she needs it for her vanity. It was the perfect find
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Eubanks

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good brushed finish, and it is all metal. But it's very thin and seems kinda cheap.
customer_reviews.author: DS785

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly like picture. Does show from Kleenex. Easily wiped clean
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: As depicted in picture
customer_reviews.text: I like the softened corners. The style goes well in my remodeled bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: femf

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: What a great buy for the price!!! looks just like pictured, even better in person
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Featherston

customer_reviews.title: Too light to be useful, attractive otherwise
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great design, but it’s too light. You can’t pull a tissue out without it moving.
customer_reviews.author: TomSDCA

customer_reviews.title: nice looking but!
customer_reviews.text: it is a very nice looking on the bathroom counter, but I do not like that is does not have a rubber gasket around the bottom, so it just seat on the counter with the medal bottom and I do not want to have it starch my counters, so I will try to make a little gasket to fit the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: but not a bad enough defect to warrant a return of the product
customer_reviews.text: Has a very small dent in one side, but not a bad enough defect to warrant a return of the product. Nice and heavy to hold down the cardboard tissue box.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Chamberlain

customer_reviews.title: Nice look!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great Kleenex box making a bathroom look nicer than any other regular Kleenex holder!!!
customer_reviews.author: Maggiesf39

customer_reviews.title: lovely and brightens up the room...
customer_reviews.text: Wanted something to brighten up the room and match the bathroom faucet and sink hardware, and this works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Ann P

customer_reviews.title: Nice size, price and
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size & easy to clean. A perfect match to other accessories

customer_reviews.title: Looks great with the rest of my stainless steel kitchen appliances
customer_reviews.text: Looks great with the rest of my stainless steel kitchen appliances, very happy with the quality and the esthetic.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great look-Great price
customer_reviews.text: This had the look that I wanted at a price that couldn't be beat. It is really nice looking!! It was for my guest bath and I didn't want to make a huge investment. The shipping was super fast too.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very obvious seam in the metal on one side and “smudges” in the metal that won’t clean off. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and put together
customer_reviews.text: Good price compared to others, and the silver looks nice with my furniture. Arrived promptly. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Dolly Leigh

customer_reviews.title: It looked like someone took a sander to it and scratched it ...
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived dented on two sides and seriously scratched on one side. It looked like someone took a sander to it and scratched it up. This was supposed to be a wedding shower gift from a couple's Amazon registry. I had to quickly buy another gift.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Brock

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Stainless Cover for the kitchen area!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! I was looking for a stainless tissue box cover for my kitchen and this was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: you can get a better quality for the same price just about a anywhere. disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie marusich

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful tissue box cover and very good quality. Enough weight to the holder to prevent pulling the box with the tissues. My second order (for a different room) and I will definitely buy again should I need more. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: MC777

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these in each of my bathrooms. It works extremely well and looks clean. I would recfomend this to friends
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Fine for my use
customer_reviews.text: Overall decent. But the weld on one side is highly visible and ugly. Fine for my use, I just put the ugly side against the wall.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, too large for standard tissue box.
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy quality, and much larger than standard Kleenex brand tissue boxes.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This tissue holder is beautiful and fits in with our bathroom decor
customer_reviews.author: Frederick P. Mcatee

customer_reviews.title: It Looks Good!
customer_reviews.text: The product look exactly like the picture and is perfect any casual room.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Felner

customer_reviews.title: I was cheated
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4 mDesign Square Paper Facial Tissue Box Cover Holder for Bathroom Vanity Countertops, Bedroom Dressers, but only received 1. I payed for 4 and received 1 I was cheated; unless I received the other 3, I don't recommend buying anything from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: unhappy

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't find one in this brushed nickel color ANYWHERE its perfect!
customer_reviews.author: NCastilleja

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice touch for the tissue box I keep in the bathroom that has brushed steel elements.
customer_reviews.author: LY

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Finish
customer_reviews.text: Brand sticker is adhered so tightly, I removed finish taking off. Good product otherwise, but I’ll have to buy a replacement, so I won’t buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tissue box, I use it in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: looks nice, a little pricey, but these always seem to be
customer_reviews.author: Dustin & Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with dents and scratches
customer_reviews.text: I second the comments from other reviewers who mentioned the shipping protection is inadequate for this tissue cover. My mDesign Tissue Box arrived with dents and scratches straight out of the box so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Terrence

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with this item!
customer_reviews.text: The price was great but the weight is too light and when you take out a tissue it lifts off surface! Needs more weight and pads on bottom
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Thurman

customer_reviews.title: It is made well.
customer_reviews.text: This tissue box cover is perfect for my bathroom. It matches the brushed stainless steel faucet and towel bars.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is a very nice addition to my "new" batroom
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly M. Whyte

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful addition!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!! Previously I had a cloth tissue box cover and could never get it clean. I wanted something sleek and easy to clean. This goes perfectly with the brushed nickel in my bathroom. The best part is this cleans so nicely.
customer_reviews.author: catinker

customer_reviews.title: exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Compact, doesn’t take up much counter space which is what I wanted. Brushed nickel finish is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: It goes perfect by my great grandmother!s lamp that has gold highlights. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: S Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good!
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect! What else can I say? It does it's job and looks nice. Arrived on time and in great condition.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: The perfect fit in my newly refinished bathroom, great find on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with the product. The pics are realistic and I got exactly what I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrey Pridmore

customer_reviews.title: Perfect design. Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very basic but that's what I wanted. Only negative is that the metal shows all the dust which is the nature of metal. I hate plastic so this holder is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Looks expensive
customer_reviews.text: This is a clean and understated look for our bathroom that has all satin nickel finishes.

customer_reviews.title: very attractive
customer_reviews.text: ordered the brushed nickel and brushed gold- both are very attractive

customer_reviews.title: Pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: My Kleenex box arrived today and after unwrapping, it had a dent and scratches along the side. Pretty disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice tissue box. Did have a scratch on it when I received it.
customer_reviews.author: Angela G.

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive
customer_reviews.text: Very handsome. Arrived with a few blemishes, but not noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: As expected, fits well with other brushed nickel in bathroom.
customer_reviews.text: Product was as expected. Nicer than what I could find in stores as most of the brushed nickel/stainless boxes in stores were scratched.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Good looking product. Arrived on time and in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: JohnInMichigan

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Simple and nice and an upgrade to our office bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: LCM

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to use and it looks great
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend it to anyone looking to buy this kind of product!
customer_reviews.author: Frances G. Lind

customer_reviews.title: Elegant tissue holder.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted to match the brass fixtures in my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Angelidee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in my new bathroom. Perfect price for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: mDesign
customer_reviews.text: Wish they made one for the larger tissue box as these little boxes run out quickly. The holder itself has a nice finish and does take less counter space. I have since found other products locally at a Bed, Bath & Beyond which are heavier and less prone to lifting when pulling a tissue. Finished nicely matches brushed nickel bath hardware. I do like the "soft" edges.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it...just what I was looking for and at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Sue L

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It had a scratch on one side. I just didn't put that side forward facing.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect color, thick aluminum which will last, and sleek design.
customer_reviews.author: April Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Very mod well designed
customer_reviews.text: Stainless steel simply designed tissue boxes use to be in all the stores but not anymore. This was the only design I found that had clean simple lines. It was an end to a long search.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Having recently entered into the world of stainless steel kitchen appliances, I wanted a tissue holder to match:). This is fairly squared off and basic in design, which I like. It is a brushed stainless as are the appliances. Stainless tissue boxes are hard to find and some of them cost the same as an actual appliance! I’m happy I got this.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Made In China
customer_reviews.text: Several years ago, I bought a stainless tissue holder at Bed Bath & Beyond and paid $24.99 plus tax. It is a substantial (heavy) tissue holder that has held up for years -- fitting over square tissue boxes. This tissue holder is "light weight", looks cheap and is made in China. There is a large sticker on the tissue holder -- saying that is is manufactured in China. The sticker had to be removed with goo remover. If not in the middle of Covit 19, I would return it. If you desire quality, look for another tissue holder.
customer_reviews.author: Tennis Gal

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Didn't realize this was a 2-pack. What a pleasant surprise! These are perfect. This is such an odd item and I just wanted something simple in brushed nickel. This fit the bill. Since there were two, I put one in the bathroom and one in the kitchen. Now I don't have to worry about what the tissue boxes look like.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Legra

product_meta.title: mDesign Square Paper Facial Tissue Box Cover Holder for Bathroom Vanity Countertops, Bedroom Dressers, Night Stands, Desks and Tables - Metal - Brushed
feature_bullets: STYLISH STORAGE: Dress up standard, square tissue boxes with this stylish cover; Easily conceals cardboard tissue boxes; The clean, sleek design is perfect for home or commercial use; Complements any decor

EASY REFILLS: Open bottom allows for easy replacement of empty tissue boxes - just lift the cover and place a new box underneath; Perfect for end tables, night stands, counter tops, vanities and desks throughout your home; Use in kitchen, living room, family room, office, craft room, bedrooms and more; Perfect for house, apartment, condo, college dorm rooms, RVs and campers
LARGE OPENING: Generously sized to hold most standard-sized square tissue boxes as well as stacks of individual facial napkins or tissues
QUALITY CONSTRUCTION: Made of strong stainless steel with a durable rust-resistant finish; Designed for use in moisture-rich bathroom environments; Easy Care - Wipe clean with damp cloth
THOUGHTFULLY SIZED: Measures 5" x 5" x 5.75" high

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars539 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
